        Update the game world.
        Parameters:
        dt: - Milliseconds elapsed since the previous frame.

      • resizeWorld

        public void resizeWorld()
        Figure out where the walls and out zones should go in case of a resize. Resize while running is not supported but I do try to clip the paddles and ball to a reasonable position.

      • componentResized

        public void componentResized(java.awt.event.ComponentEvent e)
        Resize event callback. Kick off the start command if not ready and we have a non-zero width and height. Couldn't put this in the constructor, it wasn't ready at that point.
        Specified by:
        componentResized in interface java.awt.event.ComponentListener

      • componentHidden

        public void componentHidden(java.awt.event.ComponentEvent e)
        Hidden event callback. Needed to get the resize event. Don't do anything with this.
        Specified by:
        componentHidden in interface java.awt.event.ComponentListener
